name: Impossible Tiles
description:
Welcome to Impossible Tiles!

A free web game for hardcore puzzle fans... there are four modes of play, and a couple of them I'm not sure if a human can mathematically beat them, but it's also possible I'm just bad at this kind of puzzle lol. I need some really puzzly/mathy/Rubik's-Cube-thinking people to check it out.

This is a browser game to be played with a mouse. Click the tiles to try and match them all to the same color. Toggle a few different music tracks (or muted), animated background or none, 'pixel' or 'glossy' graphics style.

To be honest, this might be more of a proof-of-concept (just an idea I had) than something that's actually fun to play, but here it is for people to try in any case.

Thanks!
